long_description: The Osprey Contrail Daypack adds protection and organization for all the necessities of travel. It's the perfect travel companion to the Osprey Contrail wheeled luggage, sold separately. AirScape spacer-mesh padded shoulder straps and back panel ventilate heat build-up away. Handle-It(TM) attachment flap quickly connects Contrail Daypack to extendable handle on most 6 in. wide roller handles; its design provides well-balanced carrying. Zippered security pocket is hidden underneath the Handle-It flap on back panel. Main compartment has wide-mouth panel access and lockable zippers; organize contents in the document sleeve, zip pocket and side mesh sleeves. Padded sleeve fits laptops to 17 in. and has direct zipper access. Padded, fleece-lined sleeve fits most tablet and e-reader devices. 2 external zippered side pockets feature internal spacer-mesh sleeves for organizing items; also includes 2 external stretch-mesh side pockets. While the Opsrey Contrail daypack is a beautiful complement to the Contrail wheeled luggage, this sharp, cosmopolitan backpack can certainly be carried on its own. Please note: although not removable, the Handle-It attachment flap lays down flush against the back panel when not in use so you won't even know its there.
short_description: The Osprey Contrail Daypack adds protection and organization for all the necessities of travel. It's the perfect travel companion to the Osprey Contrail wheeled luggage, sold separately.
